documentation.text:
@title StaffRegistry
 @dev Immutable registry for staff identities and payroll batches

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only owner can perform this action"

arguments.value: Only owner can perform this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only owner can perform this action"

documentation.text:
@dev Register a new staff member on the blockchain
 @param _staffHash SHA-256 hash of staff identity

@dev Revoke a staff member's registration

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Staff count must be greater than 0"

arguments.value: Staff count must be greater than 0
